column5: Making our first ever trip to this camp this summer. Booked cabin four for a week. Anyone have pictures of that cabin or anything around camp. Any tips on the camp? Docks? Power on the docks? Security for gear in boats at night?This will be my fiftieth trip to Canada and I don't need any more surprises if I can avoid them ahead of time.Pooch

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YlCTngm4VpsHere is a youtube that has some of the answers to your questions.Cabin 4 is in the back of one part when Andrea is sitting on the deck of cabin 8, towards the end of the video. Lets get together again at BP and Ill try to fill you in! Dave
